item.title: Judge temporarily blocks Trump from deploying troops in Portland
item.description: Oregon officials had challenged President Donald Trump’s move to send troops to the state’s largest city, calling it “patently unlawful.”

item.title: Many American Jews sharply critical of Israel on Gaza, Post poll finds
item.description: Most Jews say Israel is committing war crimes — and 39 percent say genocide — while often distinguishing between the country and its leadership.

item.title: Republicans threaten return to Musk’s chainsaw strategy to government
item.description: Rather than sticking to an easy strategy, Republicans are threatening a risky strategy of mass firings of federal workers because of the government sh...

item.title: Trump sees shutdown as tool to shrink government, target foes
item.description: The president’s failure to achieve funding for his border wall in 2018 shutdown informed his less compromising strategy this time.

item.title: Democrats’ defiance on shutdown shows a new, tougher approach to Trump
item.description: After eight months of getting battered by Republicans, the party has largely abandoned efforts at conciliation or outreach.
